Room.Name: Tower Tunnel
Room.ShortDescription: You are in a stone vault with no apparent exit except small and dark steps.
Room.LongDescription: The steps lead down into quiet blackness, the only way out. There is a ledge overhead and you can see the wall is set back a few meters from there to the ceiling. You could probably climb up there if the walls were not so slippery with slime and fungus. But why would you want to?
